briefTitle: A Study of SI-6603 in Patients With Lumbar Disc Herniation
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Study of SI 6603 in Patients With Lumbar Disc Herniation (Phase III)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of SI-6603(Condoliase) in patients with lumbar disc herniation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAE)

commonTop: Nuclear magnetic resonance imaging spinal abnormal
